# Plaza Monumental de Morelia

Plaza Monumental de Morelia (Monumental Plaza of Morelia in English), is a multi-purpose complex in Morelia, in the state of Michoac√°n, Mexico. The complex can seat up to 15,000 people. It accommodates bullfights, jaripeos, and concerts.
